Summary: 2 bright lights alternating blue/green to red dancing like fireflies w/no sound
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Rancho Cucamonga
There were no other sightings in Rancho Cucamonga on or around August 4th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out back door of my house, saw 2 objects which at first I thought were airplanes or helicopters. However, they danced back & forth and up & down like gigantic fireflies about 3 to 5 miles west of my house, heading west along the foothills of the San Gabriel mountains, making no sounds. They flew back & forth, up & down like fireflies - no man made objects could maneuver like that. My 11 year old daughter, 26 year old step daughter and my wife also watched them for 10 minutes until they appeared to descend against the side of the foothills and the lights were gone. None of us have ever seen anything like it. They definitely were aircraft sized lights. It was too dark to take a photo.
